mapper.select:
SELECT T1.CNTR_NO /*계약번호*/ , T1.CNTR_SN /*일련번호*/ , T1.CNTR_NO || T1.CNTR_SN AS CNTR , T4.CST_KNM /*고객명*/ , T4.COPN_DV_CD , (SELECT PD_NM FROM TB_PDBS_PD_BAS WHERE 1 = 1 AND T1.BASE_PD_CD = PD_CD AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N') AS PD_NM/*제품명*/ , T2.EOT_ATAM AS DP_AMT /*선수금(원)*/ , (SELECT FNIT_NM FROM TB_RVDW_FNIT_CD WHERE 1 = 1 AND FNIT_CD = T6.BNK_CD AND DTA_DL_YN = 'N') AS FNIT_CD /*은행명*/ , T6.ACNO_ENCR/*계좌번호*/ , T6.OWR_KNM AS DPR_NM /*예금주*/ , T2.RENTAL_TN AS NMN /*차월*/ , T2.CAN_DT AS CNTR_PD_ENDDT /*만료/취소년월*/ , T1.CNTR_DTL_STAT_CD /* 종료구분 *//*종료구분*/ FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL T1 /*계약상세*/ INNER JOIN TB_CBCL_WELLS_SL_MM_CL_IZ T2 /*계약월마감*/ ON ( T2.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T2.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN AND T2.SL_CL_YM = #{dpDt} AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N') INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS T3 ON ( T3.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N') INNER JOIN TB_CUBS_CST_BAS T4 /*고객기본*/ ON ( T4.CST_NO = T3.CNTR_CST_NO AND T4.DTA_DL_YN = 'N') LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_STLM_REL T5 --계약결재관계 ON T5.DTL_CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T5.DTL_CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN AND T5.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND SUBSTR(T5.VL_STRT_DTM, 1, 6) <= T2.SL_CL_YM AND SUBSTR(T5.VL_END_DTM, 1, 6) >= T2.SL_CL_YM LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_STLM_BAS T6 -- 계약결제기본 ON T6.CNTR_STLM_ID = T5.CNTR_STLM_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T1.SELL_TP_CD = '2' AND T2.RENTAL_TN > T2.CNTR_PTRM AND T2.EOT_ATAM > 0
AND T2.SL_CL_YM = #{dpDt}
AND T4.COPN_DV_CD = #{copnDvCd} /* 계약구분 1.개인, 2.법인 */
AND T2.CAN_DT >= #{cntrPdEnddt}||'01' /* 만료취소년월 */ AND T2.CAN_DT <= #{cntrPdEnddt}||'31' /* 만료취소년월 */
AND T1.CNTR_DTL_STAT_CD = #{cntrDtlStatCd} /* 종료구분 전체, 402.만료, 303.취소, */

SELECT SUM(NVL(T2.EOT_ATAM,0)) AS DP_AMT /*선수금(원)*/ FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL T1 /*계약상세*/ INNER JOIN TB_CBCL_WELLS_SL_MM_CL_IZ T2 /*계약월마감*/ ON ( T2.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T2.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN AND T2.SL_CL_YM = #{dpDt} AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N') INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS T3 ON ( T3.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N') INNER JOIN TB_CUBS_CST_BAS T4 /*고객기본*/ ON ( T4.CST_NO = T3.CNTR_CST_NO AND T4.DTA_DL_YN = 'N') LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_STLM_REL T5 --계약결재관계 ON T5.DTL_CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T5.DTL_CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN AND T5.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND SUBSTR(T5.VL_STRT_DTM, 1, 6) <= T2.SL_CL_YM AND SUBSTR(T5.VL_END_DTM, 1, 6) >= T2.SL_CL_YM LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_STLM_BAS T6 -- 계약결제기본 ON T6.CNTR_STLM_ID = T5.CNTR_STLM_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T1.SELL_TP_CD = '2' AND T2.RENTAL_TN > T2.CNTR_PTRM AND T2.EOT_ATAM > 0
AND T2.SL_CL_YM = #{dpDt}
AND T4.COPN_DV_CD = #{copnDvCd} /* 계약구분 1.개인, 2.법인 */
AND T2.CAN_DT >= #{cntrPdEnddt}||'01' /* 만료취소년월 */ AND T2.CAN_DT <= #{cntrPdEnddt}||'31' /* 만료취소년월 */
AND T1.CNTR_DTL_STAT_CD = #{cntrDtlStatCd} /* 종료구분 전체, 402.만료, 303.취소, */
